expected_criteria: The idea must be a technology product or service. It must clearly combine data analysis with fitness or health. The monetization strategy should be plausible for a tech product (e.g., subscription, one-time purchase).
The idea must be related to branding, design, or marketing for sustainable or eco-friendly businesses. The concept should be creative and visually oriented.
The idea must be an educational tool, preferably a mobile app, focused on teaching music. The concept should be suitable for beginners or students.
The idea must involve food and community interaction. It could be an event-based service or a platform connecting local food enthusiasts. The monetization should be event- or service-based.
The idea must be a service or tool aimed at developers or tech companies. It must leverage technical writing skills and relate to AI or software documentation.
